text: Aalst is a municipality found in the Belgian province of East Flanders. In 2007, its population was 77,790. It is found at 50° 56 North, 04° 02 East. In 2022, its population was 88.854. The city is famous for its Belfry, industrial history, the Sint-Martinus Kerk and Carnival. == References == Category:Municipalities of East Flanders
title: Aalst, Belgium
